title: Make PlainAccessControlFlowTest portable
description:
Test case PlainAccessControlFlowTest is not properly composed. It binds to Linux and modifies the configuration files from the source file directory.

Further, It does not follow hermetic principle described here https://bazel.build/reference/test-encyclopedia
